items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and beautiful!
items.body: I really love this dress, and my husband was enamored by it too! Stats: 5’ 11 | 230 lbs | size 14 | hourglass with extra skin from weight loss on my arms and torso. If youve lost a lot of weight and want to mask extra skin, this is the one! I ordered a 2X, and the dress was a little big on me, but I wanted it to be more forgiving on the figure. A few things I want to note, without docking stars. #1] Shapewear was a must for me. It is a thick material that does lay on the skin nicely (great fall winter dress!), but a colored dress still shows any imperfections. However, most of us probably wear Shapewear for comfort/security anyway. #2] The navy is quite a bit lighter than shown in the picture, however the color still looked stunning. So if you’re shopping online trying to pair it with a navy shoe monochrome look , order the dress first to see the color then buy your shoes. I felt like a classy woman in this. The dress is constructed very well, no loose threads and quality fabric. I LOVE where the length hit on me as a tall woman, feminine, modest, still showing the curve of the calf. Read more
items.author: Kaylee Stevens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would Recommend
items.body: Stunning dress, very comfortable and flattering. I always take a gamble with dresses as I am 5" and @ 100lbs so often a Small fits terribly. This one is great - not too tight but also not too loose. The front hem falls a few inches below my knee and the back hem a little below mid calf. Plenty of fabric stretch and the black is a nice dark color. The hem is longer in the back than the front which adds a classy touch that I didn't expect. Purchased for a funeral and would definitely recommend for someone looking for a conservative, classy dress. Picture is straight out of the bag, could use a little bit of steaming but wrinkles were minimal straight out of the package. Read more
items.author: Jenna K

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Red, Blackish Green, Khaki, Pink, Lake Green, Burgundy, Dark Blue, Moss Green, Purple Rose, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
